comment: Super fun tennis class. Coach can be reserved at first but once you get to know him he is awesome. 3 take home quizzes and a final over those 3 quizzes and a skills test at the end. Super easy and I enjoyed it a lot. He knows what he is doing!

Tough class on the physical side, but truly an easy credit. Easy A, pretty sure everybody got an A+ He knows what he's doing and if you want to improve in tennis quickly this is a good choice. Had 3 easy quizzes, a midterm, and a final all written then a practical skills test which even our worst players passed.
Show up to all the classes and you will pass. He give super easy quizzes. and the finals is easy. But you must know he has a nasty attitude and sometime disrespectful. He shows lack of careness.
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: I took beginner tennis from Coach Darrio - easy A. Only grades are 3 tests, a midterm, and a final written and a practical exam. No homework (besides practicing, of course) and no book. The final practical was a little wonky, but if you study the handouts and at least know how to explain what you're supposed to be doing, you'll be fine. :)
